member.name: T:BlackBox.BufferProxy
member.summary: A log sink proxy that buffers messages and write them at once to all the child log sinks when the buffer size threshold have been reached.

member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources

member.summary: Performs the writing of the specified entry to the log sink.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer.
